meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Geoff Berman Judy Paullus Tom Nichols Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2173.

td.p: Geoff Berman, a writer originally from Atlanta,Georgia
Judy Paullus, a computer programmer from Newbury Park, California
Tom Nichols, a professor originally from Chicopee, Massachusetts (whose 2-day cash winnings total $24,200)

tr.td: THE 1970s
GAME SHOWS
ETIQUETTE
CREEPY CRAWLY THINGS
COLLEGES & UNIVERSITIES
8-LETTER WORDS
